Html:
Hi,

We have used Umbraco Full Text Search 6.1.2 integrated in our umbraco 6.1.3 Website, it's also integrated with Polyglot 1.6.1 package and implemented for Multi-Language, but it serached with Chinese Searchwords and found nothing, although that Chinese Searchwords are absolutely in the Web site. With its eng. Searchwords it will be found.

Do you have Idea how to work it? Is Umbraco Full Text Search able to Uni-code search?

Thanks a lot!
